channel.title: Pages on 🧑🏻‍💻 Book Of Daniel
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on 🧑🏻‍💻 Book Of Daniel

item.description: I am a Cloud Architect by profession 👨🏻‍💻, and my alter ego is that of a Developer 🤷🏽 I am a hobbyist software developer and a tinkerer. For a brief period, I was in the academia—at the Middlesex University, London—doing research, from where I obtained a BSc. in Computer Science (2008) and a PhD in Artificial Intelligence & Computational Linguistics (2011). In 2013, I founded the tech team at Zerodha, now India’s largest stock broker, where I have been the CTO ever since.
